thread.title_full: Love staying at the Roger Smith - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: J6976FZpaula
title: Love staying at the Roger Smith -
text: You can not beat the location of the Roger Smith Walking distance to Grand Central and lots of great restaurants near by. The staff make you feel like you are home. It is a unique boutique hotel with each room having it own funky style. If you embrace the spirit of the place you will love your stay
